Posts.Content: Oct 26, 2007 06:25AM Wenda wrote: In June I was diagnosed with invasive ductal carcinoma and a component DCIS, negative margins, negative sentinel node, radiation therapy for 6 weeks.  The medical oncologist wants me to take tamoxifen.  I really do not want to.  My OncoDx returned 8.  I do not have my uterus, but still have the ovaries.  Do you think the tamoxifen is necessary?
Posts.Title: Oncotype Dx test... Harley44 123JustMe
